plot: After a tragic accident, a depressed family man struggles to heal and move on as three angels come to visit and point him toward the path of forgiveness.
title: Table of the Heart
plot_es: After a tragic accident, a depressed family man struggles to heal and move on as three angels come to visit and point him toward the path of forgiveness.
plot_en: After a tragic accident, a depressed family man struggles to heal and move on as three angels come to visit and point him toward the path of forgiveness.
